result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
result.translation: 10. Kaak iyyaanah: woo digaalá koo kah geytem ku nafsii kee ku- namma gaba koroosannuu kee umaanek tatrusseeh bahteemih sabbata, kaadu diggah Yalli isi naqoosak dambi maliinoh num madigaala.
